attributes.action: undertake not to impose additional fines or stealth taxes on the public under the excuse of achieving recycling or global warming targets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most people welcome reasonable recycling and emision reduction measures particularly when these are voluntary. However, there seems to be a serious danger that enthusiasts will wish to enforce unreasonable burdens on the general public, in many cases measures where the benefits are unproven. In other cases, proposed steps seem driven by ill considered targets or by the desire to raise more revenue, neither directly related to the common good.
